Uses of RuntimeSupportFilter in org.jgentleframework.context.aop
 

Subinterfaces of RuntimeSupportFilter in org.jgentleframework.context.aop
 interface ConstructorFilter
          Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of target Constructor.
 interface FieldFilter
          The Interface FieldFilter.
 interface MethodFilter
          Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of methods.
 interface ParameterFilter<T>
          Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of parameters corresponding to an given set of methods.
 

Classes in org.jgentleframework.context.aop that implement RuntimeSupportFilter
 class DynamicallySupportFilter<T extends Matching>
          Represents a dinamically filter.
 class StaticallySupportFilter<T extends Matching>
          Represents a statically filter.
 class TrueFieldFilter
          Canonical FieldFilter instance that matches all Field.
 class TrueMethodFilter
          Canonical MethodFilter instance that matches all Method.
 class TrueParameterFilter
          Canonical ParameterFilter instance that matches all parameters of all methods.
